citations.narrative:
* The last recorded date of sampling for parasites in the facility’s 22 dogs was 8/3/22. The Program of Veterinary Care
states that this licensee must test two dogs in the facility for heartworm disease one time and fecal testing two times every
year. Parasite testing according to the sampling plan outlined by the attending veterinarian in the Program of Veterinary
care is important for the health of the animals. Heartworm and fecal float testing are done to ensure that there are no
internal parasites. Heartworms are serious parasites that are transmitted by mosquito bites. The licensee must ensure
that a sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm)
must be done in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian. Correct by 12/1/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
* The last recorded date of sampling for parasites in the facility’s 22 dogs was 8/3/22. The Program of Veterinary Care 
states that this licensee must test two dogs in the facility for heartworm disease one time and fecal testing two times every 
year. Parasite testing according to the sampling plan outlined by the attending veterinarian in the Program of Veterinary 
care is important for the health of the animals. Heartworm and fecal float testing are done to ensure that there are no 
internal parasites. Heartworms are serious parasites that are transmitted by mosquito bites. The licensee must ensure 
that a sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) 
must be done in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian. Correct by 12/1/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
